subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Scholarships and Fellowships
lead_paragraph: Doug McDermott, Creighton’s best player and the head coach’s son, passed up a scholarship this year so point guard Grant Gibbs could get one.
snippet: Doug McDermott, Creighton’s best player and the head coach’s son, passed up a scholarship this year so point guard Grant Gibbs could get one.
